attributes.review: i downloaded the app and when i oped it up trump there he was! he asked me if i should o enable notifications? and i said yes of course because i love the wonderful united americas and our brave mr potus. but now he's notifications are every 2 minutes and just keeps calling me racial slurs? imm white who is he talking to why would trump hate against me with his app i'm a loyal trump vote!! this has to be the wrong app. which one for me to access the rallies and cool merch? if you know please you can reach me on facebook imll friend you😁
attributes.title: how is this app allowed 😡😡

attributes.review: I downloaded the app many days ago and it hasn’t been finished. It’s been a month and it hasn’t downloaded. I am ashamed that you didn’t spend any of your time and money on this app. Us sand- i meant trump supporters expected the app to be available to us!
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: The download time took soo long! And once you get it, there’s a lot of ads keep popping out of my screen!! I hate it 🤬 It says you have to have to pay monthly to keep it running. This app will squeeze out your money from your pocket! I dont recommend this app 😡
attributes.title: The WORST App EVER made!!!!

attributes.review: I was so excited to have an app to keep me updated on the great Orange 🍊 one, but this app is trash 🗑 All the updates say that he’s still president🥺 AND that he’s running in 2020 🥺 I really wish this app would give me better updates 0/10 do not recommend
attributes.title: Disappointed🥺

attributes.review: This app was absolute garbage. I 100% do NOT recommend this to anyone. It lacks creativity and substance. I’m disappointed with his campaign in general. Please remember not to vote for someone who got everything handed to him his whole life, and have little regard for others. Thanks for listening to my ted talk.
attributes.title: Trash

attributes.review: It took an HOUR to download onto my phone.  When I opened the app, my phone started tweaking. It reminded me of that one time i found my step brother’s girlfriend behind a dumpster at the gas station shooting up. 😭 I had a major ptsd and started song the Harlem shake on the ground. 1 star. 😭
attributes.title: What the heck!?

attributes.review: This app is beyond horrible it goes without say apple store and google play have been mine played. This app not only glitches it give negative vibes and possibly give hackers our money don’t recommend disappointed in the App Store for letting this app be on here 💔
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: This app kept loading and took forever to open. I do not support trump in any way and I hope you all do not vote for him because he turned this country into trash and he will make it even worse then he already did. #dontsupporttrump
attributes.title: It’s trash

attributes.review: It took a long time to download it was hard to use and it made all of my important messages and emails delete after 1 day my phone started glitching and eventually stopped working so I recommend to not download this app
attributes.title: Don’t download ‼️

attributes.review: It was a nice sunday after noon and i just felt this dark energy come over me so i decided to open my phone but when i did i saw that the orange puff cheeto app was there and i felt how that inhuman thing was taking all my rights away and I immediately deleted it now i suffer from lack of rights and freedom of speech.
attributes.title: BE WARE DO NOT DOWLOAD
